features: 3 ways to carry make this bag versatile for any adventure. Carry it over your shoulder, on your back, or as a duffel
In addition to the main compartment, a small front pocket offers quick access to smaller items – perfectly sized for smaller toiletry kits and electronics
Rugged and durable, the Bi-Tech™ Armor Lite is a strong material that helps to provide protection in high wear areas and against stains and scuffs
Have an additional level of protection against theft with lockable zippers and a Central Lock Point with Secure Zip™ Toggles
Zip-Away breathable 3D Air Mesh backpack straps offer ventilation and comfort when carrying a large load on your back
An interior zippered mesh pocket in the main compartment helps to keep your belongings separate and organized
External latch points and side compression straps allow this pack to be easily secured to a car or have additional items stored on your pack
Life never slows down, and the quick grab handles on the top, side and front make sure you never should either
Covered by the No Matter What™ Warranty, protecting your bag from abuse, no matter what
